articles.description: Class from the Liverpool skipper.
articles.content:
Henderson trained at Melwood this week (Picture: Getty)
Jordan Henderson has offered his backing to NGolo Kante and Troy Deeney after the pair refused to train amid the coronavirus pandemic.
